ResearchProjectDef.label: battery technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft rechargeable batteries for powering advanced tools. Basic batteries provide moderate capacity and are suitable for most powered equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced battery technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop high-capacity industrial batteries with significantly improved energy density. These batteries provide extended operating time for power tools in demanding work environments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: industrial battery technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Master cutting-edge battery technology including nuclear power cells. Nuclear batteries offer exceptional capacity but require careful handling. Advanced fabrication techniques enable high-performance batteries for extended field operations.
